  • Dwb-City

    • Install
      • Mount
        • mount with global
        • mount with component
      • Use
        • Example
          • Author

          # Dwb-City

          # Install

          npm i dwb-city --save

          # Mount

          # mount with global

          import Vue from 'vue'
import City from 'dwb-city'

Vue.use(City)

          # mount with component

          import { dwbCity } from 'dwb-city'

export default {
  components: {
    dwbCity
  }
}

          # Use

          <dwb-city v-model="show"
      :data="cityData"
      :city="city"
      ref="city"
      @change="getData"/>

          data () {
  return {
    cityData: [CITY JSON],
    show: [True/False],
    city: [110000, 110100, 110112]
  }
}
// set Data Method or
this.$refs.city.setCurr(this.city)

          # Example

          npm install

npm run dev

          [Dwb City]

          # Author

          [Dengwb]
